DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the long- term safety and effectiveness of adalimumab in participants with non-infectious intermediate-, posterior-, or pan-uveitis in daily practice in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: HUMIRAÂ® Long-term Treatment in Patients With Non-infectious Intermediate-, Posterior-, or Pan-uveitis
DOC.criteria: Participants receiving adalimumab for the treatment of Noninfectious Intermediate, Posterior, or Panuveitis Participants previously treated with adalimumab
